content: AVOID THIS APP The NHS Covid-19 App   Anyone who is notified through the NHS Covid-19 app that they should self-isolate is strongly encouraged do so. In cases where individuals are in the same household, if the devices do not meet the criteria, then no notification will be sent. The app solely relies on Bluetooth connectivity in order to assess risk.
